Articles.Content:
Black cloud.

Burst into a huge black cloud then fly away.

Catapult ,

At a high altitude ,spin and decouple a part sending it flying.

Request a video of one of these. (If you need it.)
I can automatically win for the catapult, just edit the .cfg for the radial decouplers, and kerbewm, you can send objest flying in all directions.
I don't think TB likes challenges too much ;P
